meanings.definition: A small, short-tailed South American rodent often kept as a pet.
meanings.sent1: The cavies in the pet store were very cute and friendly.
meanings.sent2: My sister loves to play with her cavies in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The cavies had a secret meeting in their tiny house.
meanings.sent4: The cavies scurried around like tiny furry acrobats.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the soft fur of the cavies I held at the zoo.
